title: Moist apple cake
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable margarine, room temperature', '3 eggs, separated', '125ml vegetable oil', '4 tablespoons orange juice', '200g caster sugar', '80g fine matzo meal', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '150g caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '4 Granny Smith apples, peeled, cored and quartered']
